My Work

Check out some of my projects...

Goodbean Github

Full Stack E-Commerce site built with Django incorporating HTML, CSS , Bootstrap, JS and Python. Deployed to Heroku and utilised Postgres for database and AWS for static files.

Terrie Homes Github

A mock House selling site built using Flask, Python, MongoDB, SQL, HTML, CSS and deployed to Heroku.

Totally Wild Tetris Github

The traditional game of tetris built with a bit of a twist and fully coded in Vanilla Javascript.

Cygnet Lawn & Maintenance Github

Static business site built with HTML and CSS and hosted on Github Pages.
